products.name: PURGENE ACNE BYE GEL
products.keyBenefits: Targets acne and acne scars; deeply hydrates and nourishes skin; helps regulate oil and moisture balance; supports skin barrier against external factors and inflammation.
products.description: Purgene Acne Bye Gel is formulated with Tea Tree Oil, Salicylic Acid, Olive Oil, Glycerin, and Vitamin E to treat and prevent acne, soothe inflammation, and deeply hydrate the skin. It promotes skin renewal and protects the barrier by regulating moisture levels. Suitable for all skin types and ideal for acne-prone skin.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to cleansed skin, focusing on acne-affected areas. Use twice daily, morning and night.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: Consistent use for 4–8 weeks for visible results
products.activeContent: Tea Tree Oil, Salicylic Acid, Olive Oil, Glycerin, Vitamin E
products.contents: 180 ml gel

products.name: PURGENE STICK SUN CREAM SPF 50+
products.keyBenefits: Provides broad-spectrum SPF 50+ protection; offers a matte, velvety finish; fragrance-free and oil-free; supports skin barrier; helps regulate sebum production.
products.description: Purgene Stick Sun Cream offers SPF 50+ broad-spectrum protection with a lightweight, matte finish. It is fragrance-free, oil-free, and formulated with ingredients that restore the skin barrier while helping to control excess sebum. Perfect for daily use and suitable for all skin types.
products.howToUse: Apply evenly to face and exposed areas 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours or after sweating/swimming.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: Daily use during sun exposure periods
products.activeContent: Zinc Oxide, Titanium Dioxide, Silica, Tocopherol (Vitamin E)
products.contents: 16g solid stick format

products.name: PURGENE FACE WHITENING AMPOULES WITH DERMAROLLER
products.keyBenefits: Brightens and evens skin tone; reduces dark spots; suppresses melanin production; antioxidant protection; enhances texture for radiant, youthful skin.
products.description: Lightens and whitens skin by targeting pigmentation with potent actives like Glutathione, Niacinamide, Arbutin, Lecithin, Vitamin C and E. Includes dermaroller to boost absorption and results.
products.howToUse: On clean skin, roll dermaroller gently (max twice/week), then apply ampoule daily. Dermaroller enhances penetration.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: 4–6 weeks for visible improvement
products.activeContent: Glutathione, Niacinamide, Arbutin, Lecithin, Vitamin C, Vitamin E
products.contents: 20 × 2 ml ampoules; 1 dermaroller (≈0.2–0.5 mm needles)

products.name: DENEFIS® EYEBROW & EYELASH CARE SERUM
products.keyBenefits: Nourishes eyebrows and eyelashes, helps them appear stronger, fuller, and more lively.
products.description: Thanks to the nourishing oils in its content, this serum supports the health and vitality of your eyebrows and eyelashes, helping them look stronger and fuller.
products.howToUse: Use the special applicator tip to apply the serum to clean brows and eyelashes. It is recommended to use twice daily, in the morning and evening. Avoid direct contact with the eyes.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: Consistent use for at least 4 weeks to observe visible improvements.
products.activeContent: Castor Oil, Argan Oil, Vitamin E
products.contents: Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil.

products.name: KALEE BEAUTY 2-IN-1 LIP OIL & CHEEK TINT - BROWN
products.keyBenefits: Lightweight, non-sticky formula that nourishes lips and cheeks, restores moisture, reduces pigmentation over time, and delivers a natural dewy glow. Multipurpose and travel-friendly.
products.description: A skin-loving tint that glides on like oil and leaves your lips and cheeks with a fresh, radiant flush. Packed with nourishing oils rich in essential fatty acids and vitamins to hydrate, soothe, and revitalize your skin without any stickiness. Perfect for everyday multitasking beauty.
products.howToUse: Dab a small amount onto clean lips and cheeks using your fingertip or applicator. Blend gently until desired intensity is achieved. Reapply as needed throughout the day.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: Use daily as part of your makeup routine for best results.
products.activeContent: Sweet Almond Oil, Hempseed Oil, Jojoba Oil, Lip-Safe Mica Pigments
products.contents: Versagel, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Cannabis Sativa (Hempseed) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Lip-Safe Mica Pigments.

Reduces itching sensations, soothes irritation, restores
freshness, promotes intimate hygiene, helps maintain pH balance, and reduces yeast infections.
products.description:
Designed for intimate hygiene, reduces itching, irritation, and
discomfort. Supports a healthy microbiome and pH balance, prevents infections, ideal during fitness, travel, menstruation, pregnancy, and postpartum. Free from parabens, soap, allergen fragrances, and alcohol.
products.howToUse: Apply foam to the intimate area, gently cleanse, rinse thoroughly. Use daily or as needed.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: Daily use for long-term intimate hygiene.
products.activeContent: Prebiotics
products.contents: Aqua, Prebiotic Complex, Mild Cleansers, Free from Parabens, Soap, Allergen Fragrances, Alcohol.

products.name: PURGÈNE ANTI HAIR LOSS SERUM
products.keyBenefits: Strengthens weakened hair, reduces hair loss, revitalizes hair follicles, and accelerates blood circulation to promote healthier hair growth
products.description: A new generation complex formulated with high-content active ingredients to eliminate root causes of hair loss. Provides a powerful leveling effect while revitalizing hair.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the scalp and massage gently. Use regularly for best results.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: 4 to 8 weeks of consistent use for visible results
products.activeContent: Sweet Almond Oil, Hempseed Oil, Jojoba Oil, Lip-Safe Mica Pigments
products.contents: Sodium Bicarbonate, Aqua, Alcohol-Free.

products.name: DENEFIS® AHA+BHA SERUM
products.keyBenefits: AHA+BHA Serum purifies the skin, supports self-renewal, revitalizes the skin, controls sebum balance, helps prevent acne formation, tightens pores, and helps reduce local skin blemishes.
products.description: AHA (Alpha Hydroxy Acids) and BHA (Beta Hydroxy Acids) provide a peeling effect. AHA+BHA Serum is a care serum that helps prevent acne formation by cleansing your skin from dead skin cells, controlling sebum balance, tightening pores, and reducing local skin blemishes. The serum is enriched with active ingredients and helps meet your skin’s moisture needs with Hyaluronic Acid.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. After cleansing and drying your skin, apply a sufficient amount of serum evenly by gently massaging. To help your skin adapt, start by using it every other night for the first week. Then, apply it once daily at night. Always use sunscreen during the day while using products containing acids.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: 4 to 6 weeks of consistent daily or alternate-day use to see noticeable results.
products.activeContent: AHA (Alpha Hydroxy Acids), BHA (Salicylic Acid), Hyaluronic Acid
products.contents: Aqua, Glycolic Acid, Lactic Acid, Salicylic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Glycerin, Propanediol, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.

products.name: PURGÈNE DELAY EFFECT LUBRICANT GEL
products.keyBenefits: Helps eliminate symptoms of genital dryness during intercourse. Maintains soft and gentle lubrication for a longer and more intense sexual experience.
products.description: Purgène Delay Effect Lubricant Gel is designed to alleviate genital dryness and provide enhanced lubrication during sexual intercourse. Its soft and gentle formula enhances comfort and contributes to a prolonged and intensified experience.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the genital area before sexual activity. For external use only.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: Use as needed before each intercourse. No daily usage required unless specified by a healthcare provider.
products.activeContent: Soothing and moisturizing agents
products.contents: Exact formulation not provided. Presumably includes water-based lubricants and mild delaying agents.

Formulated to the highest feminine hygiene standards, free from
irritant detergents, effective against fungi and odors, provides a fresh, clean feeling.
products.howToUse: Lather with water, apply to the external intimate area, rinse thoroughly. Use daily.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: Daily use for hygiene and freshness.
products.activeContent: Acetic Acid (Vinegar)
products.contents:
Acetic Acid, Mild Cleansing Agents, Fragrance-Free, No irritant

products.name: DENEFIS STEM CELL FACE&BODY MOISTURIZING REVITALIZE CREAM
products.keyBenefits: Denefis Stem Cell Face & Body Moisturizing Revitalize Cream brightens skin, deeply moisturizes, and promotes cell regeneration with herbal stem cells.
products.description: It targets cell renewal in the skin with its special formula enriched with plant stem cells. It repairs and strengthens the skin barrier with Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide) and Panthenol, eliminates skin tone inequality with Glutathione, supports skin brightness and a soft appearance. It also helps retain water in the skin for longer periods of time with Allantoin.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. Apply a sufficient amount of product to your clean skin with circular movements.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: Ongoing daily use as part of your regular skincare routine.
products.activeContent: Niacinamide, Maltodextrin, Glutathione, Panthenol, Allantoin, Swertia Chirata Extract
products.contents: Aqua, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Niacinamide, Maltodextrin, Glutathione, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Dimethicone, Carbomer, Allantoin, Parfum, Cyclopentasiloxane, Swertia Chirata Extract, Polysorbate 20, Tetrasodium EDTA, Linalool, D-Limonene.

products.name: DENEFIS STEM CELL STRENGTHENING SHAMPOO FOR HAIR FALL REDUCTION
products.keyBenefits: Denefis Stem Cell Strengthening Shampoo reduces hair fall by stimulating follicle renewal, strengthening hair from root to tip, improving scalp health, and enhancing hair’s overall appearance.
products.description: With its unique recipe enhanced with herbal stem cells, stem cell shampoo promotes cell rejuvenation. Since it contains specific plant extracts, it helps prevent hair loss and makes hair appear healthier and brighter. With the help of Keratin and Garlic Extract, it strengthens hair strands and root layers and promotes hair adherence to the skin's surface. With Pentavitin, it balances the scalp's moisture content. Horse Tail Extract makes hair appear brighter and fuller.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. Take a sufficient amount of shampoo and massage into wet hair to lather. Then rinse thoroughly with plenty of water.
products.timeOfUse: The Denefis Stem Cell Strengthening Shampoo is designed for daily use, ideally applied to wet hair in the morning and evening.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: The recommended usage duration for Denefis Stem Cell Strengthening Shampoo is a minimum of 2 months to observe noticeable improvements in hair health and reduction in hair fall.
products.activeContent: Panthenol, Pentavitin, Horse Tail Extract, Garlic Extract, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Glycerin, Allantoin, Fennel Extract, Humulus Lupulus Extract, Lemon Grass Extract, Achillea Millefolium Extract
products.contents: Aqua, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Cocamide DEA, Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Panthenol, Equisetum Arvense Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Lauryl Glucoside, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Propylene Glycol, Allium Sativum Bulb Extract, Foeniculum Vulgare Fruit Extract, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Citric Acid, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Allantoin, Urea, Swertia Chirata Extract, Sodium Citrate, Alcohol, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Maltodextrin, Viscum Album Leaf Extract, Saccharide Isomerate, Humulus Lupulus Extract, Tetrasodium EDTA, Hydrolyzed Keratin.

products.name: DENEFIS VITAMIN C SERUM
products.keyBenefits: Denefis Vitamin C Serum brightens skin, reduces dark spots, boosts collagen production, and protects against environmental damage.
products.description: The goal of Vitamin C Serum is to revive and brighten your skin. Strongened by active components, the serum's ascorbic acid helps to balance skin tone, prevent age spots, and improve collagen formation, giving the appearance of firmer, more vibrant skin. With its hydrating properties, hyaluronic acid, glycerin, allantoin, and vitamin B5 (Panthenol) help to give tired-looking skin a more vibrant appearance.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. Apply to clean skin. Massage into the skin every day regularly before going to bed at night.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: at least 3 months of consistent daily application to observe significant improvements in skin brightness, texture, and reduction of hyperpigmentation.
products.activeContent: Allantoin, 3-o Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Glycerin, Hyaluronic Acid
products.contents: Aqua, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Panthenol, Polysorbate 20, Allantoin, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Tetrasodium EDTA.

products.name: DENEFIS LIPOSOMAL CAFFEINE EYE CONTOUR CREAM
products.keyBenefits: The key benefits of Denefis Liposomal Caffeine Eye Contour Cream are reducing puffiness and dark circles, tightening and firming the skin around the eyes, moisturizing deeply, and soothing tired eyes.
products.description: This product contains caffeine liposomes for eye contour care. Liposomal transport technology allows the product to reach the skin's bottom layer, demonstrating its effectiveness. Its enhanced recipe gives the eye contour with strong hydration. It lessens bruising, swelling, and the look of fatigue. The skin absorbs it readily. It is Non-Comedogenic.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. Suitable for daily use. After cleaning your fingertips, apply a generous amount of the cream to the under-eye area and the eyelid.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: 4 to 8 weeks of consistent application to see noticeable results.
products.activeContent: Vitamin E, Niacinamide, Liposomal Caffeine, Collagen, Hyaluronic Acid, Aloe Vera Extract, Green Tea Extract, Panthenol, Bisabolol
products.contents: Aqua, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, PEG-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Pentylene Glycol, Lecithin, Tocopherol, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Propanediol, Niacinamide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caffeine, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Bisabolol, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Tetrasodium EDTA, Carbomer.

products.name: DENEFIS OIL BASED FACE CLEANSING MIX
products.keyBenefits: The key benefits of Denefis oil-based face cleansing mix are effectively removing makeup and impurities, dissolving excess oil without stripping the skin, maintaining hydration, and leaving the skin soft and balanced.
products.description: It is a nourishing and rinseable oil-based mixture that can be used in the first stage of the two-stage skin cleansing. It supports balancing the oil production in the skin with Zinc PCA in its improved formula. It helps to reduce the formation of blackheads with Niacinamide, and to soften and moisturize the skin with Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract and Panthenol. Lavandula Angustifolia Flower Extract and Achillea Millefolium Flower Extract support the soothing and purifying of the skin.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. You can use it in your morning and evening routines. Apply a sufficient amount of the oil mixture to your dry skin by gently massaging it in circular motions. Rinse your skin with warm water after application.
products.timeOfUse: best used once daily, typically as the first step in a double cleansing routine, usually in the evening.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: The usage duration for oil-based face cleansing mix is ongoing daily use as part of your regular skincare routine, with benefits visible immediately and improving over time.
products.activeContent: Niacinamide, Zinc PCA, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia Flower Extract, Panthenol, Achillea Millefolium Flower Extract
products.contents: Aqua, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Glycerin, Lauryl Glucoside, Niacinamide, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Zinc PCA, Lactic Acid, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia Flower Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Panthenol, Achillea Millefolium Flower Extract, Tetrasodium EDTA.

products.name: DENEFIS PURIFYING PORE SERUM
products.keyBenefits: Denefis Purifying Pore Serum deeply cleanses pores, minimizes their appearance, controls excess oil, prevents breakouts, and promotes smoother, clearer skin.
products.description: It helps eliminate dead skin cells and provide clarity to the skin. This compound, from the Beta Hydroxy Acid (BHA) group, is especially effective on oily and acne-prone skin. Salicylic Acid helps gently cleanse dead cells on the surface of the skin, soothe and purify the skin. It penetrates the inner walls of clogged pores and cleans foreign substances, while helping to increase circulation and remove excess sebum. Other active ingredients help support skin health with their Anti-Microbial and Anti-Oxidant properties.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. Apply a sufficient amount of Anti-Acne 2% Salicylic Serum to your clean and dried skin by massaging it in. It is recommended to use it just before going to bed. To acclimate your skin to salicylic acid, apply it every other day for one week. Afterward, apply it to your skin no more than once a day. Finally, apply your moisturizer. To protect your skin from the harmful effects of the sun, make sure to use face sunscreen cream during the day.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: 4 to 6 weeks of consistent daily or alternate-day use to see noticeable results.
products.activeContent: Salicylic Acid, Allantoin, Rosa Damascena Extract, Vitis Vinifera Seed Extract, Salvia Officinalis Leaf, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf
products.contents: Aqua, Alcohol, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Vitis Vinifera Seed Extract, Salicylic Acid, Propanediol, Glycerin, Humulus Lupulus Extract, Salvia Officinalis Leaf Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Allantoin, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Tetrasodium EDTA.

products.name: DENEFIS STEM CELL 50+ SPF BB CREAM
products.keyBenefits: The Stem Cell 50+ SPF BB Cream brightens skin tone, hydrates and firms, reduces fine lines, evens complexion, and provides high sun protection.
products.description: Its unique formulation, enhanced with plant stem cells, attempts to shield your skin from the sun's damaging rays while maintaining the integrity of your skin's color and balancing out your skin tone with its light structure. With plant stem cells in this unique composition fortified with active substances, it promotes cell rejuvenation. Hyaluronic acid and allantoin help to meet your skin's moisture needs; phospholipids make moisturizing substances easier to permeate the skin; vitamin E helps to repair sun-damaged skin; and panthenol helps to reinforce the skin barrier.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. Apply a sufficient amount of product to your clean skin with your hand, brush and sponge.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: daily and continuously as part of your skincare and makeup routine, with visible benefits typically appearing after 2 to 4 weeks of regular use.
products.activeContent: Phospholipids, Panthenol, Hyaluronic Acid, Allantoin, Vitamin E, Swertia Chirata Extract
products.contents: Aqua, Titanium Dioxide, PEG-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Phospholipids, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Benzophenone-3, TALC, Cetearyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dimethicone, Carbomer, Allantoin, Cetyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopheryl Acetate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Lecithin, Parfum, Cyclopentasiloxane, Swertia Chirata Extract, Polysorbate 20, Tetrasodium EDTA, Linalool, D-Limonene, CI 77499, CI 77492, CI 77491.

products.name: DENEFIS STEM CELL HAIR CARE SPRAY
products.keyBenefits: Denefis Stem Cell Hair Care Spray stimulates hair follicle renewal, nourishes and strengthens hair and scalp, supports new hair formation, and fortifies hair from root to tip.
products.description: This hair care product was created especially for both men and women. With its unique recipe enhanced with herbal stem cells, it aids in promoting cell renewal in the hair root. The product's Procapil and Keratin help the hair strands stick to the skin's surface by strengthening the root layers and hair strands. Its biotin (B7 vitamin) presence aids in nourishing the hair strands. Rosemary Leaf Extract may stimulate hair follicles and may encourage hair to grow faster by improving circulation in the scalp.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. Give the bottle a good shake before using it. Apply the product by rubbing it into the roots of your hair, whether it is wet or dry. After applying, wait three hours before washing your hair. To observe its maximum efficiency, it is advised to use it with Denefis Stem Cell Shampoo for a minimum of 3 months.
products.timeOfUse: DENEFIS® Stem Cell Hair Care Spray is recommended for daily use, preferably in the evening. Apply 7 to 10 sprays directly onto the scalp, massaging gently to ensure even distribution. Leave the product on without rinsing for at least 3 hours to allow optimal absorption. For best results, continue use for a minimum of 2 months.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: The recommended usage duration for DENEFIS® Stem Cell Hair Care Spray is a minimum of 2 months of consistent daily application to observe noticeable improvements in hair health and growth.
products.activeContent: Niacinamide, Glycerin, Maltodextrin, Swertia Chirata Extract, Biotin, Keratin, Procapil, Aloe Vera Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Panthenol, Vitamin B6

products.name: DENEFIS COLLAGEN SERUM
products.keyBenefits: The key benefits of Denefis Collagen Serum are improving skin elasticity, reducing fine lines and wrinkles, hydrating the skin, promoting firmness, and enhancing overall skin texture.
products.description: The goal of Collagen Serum is to lessen the aging symptoms that gradually appear on your skin. Acetyl Hexapeptide-8 is an amino peptide that was created to assist lessen the look of wrinkles and fine lines. It is present in the serum that has been fortified with active chemicals. It helps relax, flatten muscles, and minimize wrinkles when applied to the skin of the face and neck. With its other ingredients, it seeks to control the skin's moisture balance.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. Apply a few drops of serum to your face twice a day, after cleansing, until absorbed.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: 4 to 12 weeks of consistent daily use to see visible improvements.
products.activeContent: Allantoin, Collagen, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Hyaluronic Acid, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8
products.contents: Aqua, Collagen, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Panthenol, Allantoin, Hyaluronic Acid, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Polysorbate 20, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Tetrasodium EDTA.

products.name: DENEFIS DEEP FACE CLEANSING FOAMING GEL
products.keyBenefits: Denefis Deep Face Cleansing Foaming Gel deeply cleanses pores, reduces blackheads, balances oil production, and soothes skin with salicylic acid and botanical extracts.
products.description: Its 1% Salicylic Acid and Hamamelis Virginia Extract content serve to balance the skin's sebum rate, which helps to minimize the greasy look while also preventing acne and blackheads at their worst by thoroughly cleansing the skin. Panthenol (Vitamin B5) hydrates the skin and enhances the function of the skin barrier, while Allantoin, Calendula Officinalis Flower Oil and Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract helps to protect and calm the skin.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. Suitable for daily use. Wet your skin with water before using the product. Then apply a sufficient amount of product to your skin by gently massaging it in a circular motion. Rinse your skin with plenty of water after application.
products.timeOfUse: twice daily—morning and evening—as part of your skincare routine.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: suitable for daily use
products.activeContent: Salicylic Acid, Allantoin, Glycerin, Panthenol, Aloe Vera Extract, Hamamelis Virginia extract, Licorice Root Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Oil, Benzophenone-4
products.contents: Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Glycerin, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium Benzoate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Calendula Officinalis Flower Oil, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana Extract, Citric Acid, Benzophenone-4, Panthenol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Allantoin, Tetrasodium EDTA, Parfum.

products.name: DENEFIS EXTERNAL INTIMATE AREA WHITENING CREAM
products.keyBenefits: The key benefits of Denefis External Intimate Area Whitening Cream are lightening dark pigmentation, evening skin tone, moisturizing delicate skin, reducing irritation, and improving overall skin texture in the intimate area.
products.description: With its strong formula, it helps balance the skin tone in the external genital area, armpits, and joint areas and make them brighter with regular use. Alpha Arbutin, Vitamin C, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract and Lilium Candidum Flower Extract in this special formula strengthened with active ingredients help improve the appearance by lightening the color of darkened areas. It strengthens the skin barrier with Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide) and Vitamin B5 (Panthenol), and supports purifying, relieving sensitivity and refreshing the sensitive area with Melaleuca Viridiflora Leaf Oil. Mandelic Acid helps reduce acne and improves the appearance of uneven skin.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. Apply sufficient amount of product to clean skin twice a day in circular motions.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: 4 to 8 weeks of consistent application to see noticeable results.
products.activeContent: Vitamin C, Niacinamide, Alpha Arbutin, Panthenol, Lilium Candidum Flower Extract, Licorice Root Extract, Mandelic Acid, Niaouli Oil

products.name: DENEFIS HYALURONIC ACID SERUM
products.keyBenefits: The key benefits of Denefis Hyaluronic Acid Serum are intense hydration, plumping of the skin, reducing fine lines and wrinkles, improving skin elasticity, and promoting a smooth, radiant complexion.
products.description: Hyaluronic Acid Serum is a care serum that moisturizes your skin and helps your skin look softer. The serum, which is strengthened with active ingredients, helps moisturize the skin with Allantoin and Vitamin B5 (Panthenol).
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. Apply a few drops of Hyaluronic Acid Serum to your clean, damp skin with circular movements.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: 4 to 12 weeks of consistent application to see noticeable results.
products.activeContent: Allantoin, Panthenol, Hyaluronic Acid
products.contents: Aqua, Glycerin, Allantoin, Polysorbate 20, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tetrasodium EDTA.

products.name: DENEFIS ANTI SPOT & ANTI WRINKLE WHITENING FACE CREAM 15 SPF
products.keyBenefits: The Anti Spot & Anti Wrinkle Whitening Face Cream with SPF 15 brightens skin tone, reduces dark spots and wrinkles, hydrates deeply, and provides sun protection.
products.description: With consistent usage, its potent mix helps to balance skin tone and produce a more radiant, brighter appearance. This unique recipe is enhanced with active ingredients, such as Vitamin C, Rice Bran Oil, and Licorice Root Extract, which assist to balance skin tone and get rid of facial imperfections. It supports a more vivid appearance by moisturizing the skin and preserving the moisture balance with Glycerin, Hyaluronic Acid, and Shea Butter. It uses Allantoin to calm inflamed skin and Vitamin E to build the skin barrier. An amino peptide called Acetyl Hexapeptide-8 was created to help minimize the visibility of wrinkles and fine lines. When applied to the skin of the face and neck, it helps to minimize wrinkles and relax and flatten muscles.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. Apply sufficient amount of product to clean skin twice a day in circular motions.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: at least 4 to 8 weeks of consistent daily use to see visible results.
products.activeContent: Niacinamide, Allantoin, Glycerin, Hyaluronic Acid, Shea Butter, Vitamin E, Rice Bran Oil, Licorice Root Extract, Acetyl Hexapeptide – 8, Vitamin C

products.name: DENEFIS ANTI BLEMISH SERUM
products.keyBenefits: Denefis Anti Blemish Serum reduces acne and blemishes, calms inflammation, unclogs pores, controls excess oil, and promotes clearer, smoother skin.
products.description: The Anti-Blemish care serum, which is enhanced with active components like Alpha Arbutin, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide), and Peptides, helps to brighten, regulate, and lessen the severity of spots. One of its components, Hyaluronic Acid, is intended to hydrate the skin.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. After cleansing your skin, apply a few drops of serum to your face twice a day until absorbed. Regular use is recommended for better results.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: 4 to 8 weeks of consistent daily use to see visible improvement.
products.activeContent: Niacinamide, Alpha Arbutin, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Allantoin, Panthenol, Hyaluronic Acid, Licorice Root Extract

products.name: DENEFIS AGE DEFYING COMPLEX SERUM
products.keyBenefits: Denefis Age Defying Complex Serum reduces wrinkles, improves skin firmness, brightens tone, deeply hydrates, and protects against environmental damage.
products.description: Retinol and peptides mixed in one product help lessen the appearance of aging in all skin types. It uses active substances to hydrate and nourish the skin. Because of its potent recipe, it helps tighten and plump the skin while reducing wrinkles and fine lines.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. In your night routine, apply 2-3 drops to dry skin after cleansing. Massage lightly until the skin absorbs all of the product. After using this product, a moisturizer must be applied. Use two or three times a week at first, then gradually increase to daily. During the first several weeks, exercise extra caution if you have sensitive skin.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: At least 4 to 12 weeks of consistent daily use to see noticeable results.
products.activeContent: Collagen, Niacinamide, Peptide Complex, Panthenol, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid
products.contents: Aqua, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Magnesium Chloride, Tetradecyl Aminobutyroylvalylaminobutyric Urea Trifluoroacetate, Palmitoyl Dipeptide-5 Diaminobutyroyl Hydroxythreonine, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Collagen, Tetrasodium EDTA, Panthenol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Niacinamide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Alpha-Arbutin, Retinol, Adenosine.

products.name: DENEFIS STEM CELL 50+ SPF FACE SUN PROTECTION CREAM
products.keyBenefits: Denefis Stem Cell 50+ SPF Face Sun Protection Cream provides high sun protection, promotes skin regeneration, hydrates and nourishes, and has a lightweight, non-greasy formula.
products.description: With its special formula enriched with plant stem cells, it aims to protect your skin from the harmful rays of the sun while also providing cell renewal with the plant stem cells it contains. It supports the moisture needs of your skin with the Hyaluronic Acid and Allantoin it contains, and helps repair damage that may occur on your skin due to sun rays with vitamin E. Phospholipids help hydrating ingredients penetrate the skin.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test it before using the product. Apply a sufficient amount of product to clean skin with circular movements approximately 25-30 minutes before sun exposure. For effective protection, repeat the use of the product at least every 2 hours throughout the day.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: Denefis Stem Cell 50+ SPF Face Sun Protection Cream can be used daily and continuously as part of your skincare routine for ongoing protection and skin benefits.
products.activeContent: Phospholipids, Hyaluronic Acid, Allantoin, Vitamin E, Swertia Chirata Extract
